website_summaries.verdict: Pick one of three colors and head for the slopes with this snow tube; it’s one of the most comfortable snow tubes available.
pros: Has two hand-sewn handles and a 6-foot towing leash
Cover doubles as a snow saucer for kids
cons: The bottom is slightly textured, which may slow it just a bit

customer_reviews.title: Very slick and comfortable, even for adults.
customer_reviews.text: This snow tube is slick! I took it for the first run and went down the hill much faster than I expected to go. My two boys decided to stick with the plastic sleds since they went slower. I am 6'2" and 220 lbs and I fit in it nicely. The strap holds it in nicely although I don't think it's necessary since it doesn't seem like it would come out once inflated. The handles on the sides have nice stitching and look like they will hold up for a long time. Overall, I love this. I will use it until my boys get a little older and braver. Maybe I just need to find a somewhat slower hill.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Westlake

customer_reviews.title: Inner tube is tiny and doesn’t fill the casing
customer_reviews.text: Have had for a few weeks. Durability seems fine. The speed is pretty slow compared to our firmer sled. Probably in a steep long hill it would pick up speed but not on our backyard hill that is pretty respectable. The inner tube doesn’t fill up the casing. The inner tube is tiny. I’m pretty disappointed. So giving stars bc it’s durable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE THE BEST TUBES EVER
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE THE BEST TUBES EVER! We usually spend at least $100 on cheap tubes at the other stores. Because they pop so easily even if it's cold outside and we haven't popped one this season. We will purchase these again. We have a huge him behind our house and it has lots of sage brush and we usually lose lots of tubes... BUT NOT THIS YEAR!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Rob

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, holes in multiple tubes, not worth price
customer_reviews.text: Bought in Feb 2016. Didn’t use that winter, stored in cool/dry room inside, opened in winter of 2017, tube had a hole in it near valve and would not hold air. Reached out for replacement tube, provided correct address via email, they sent to old/incorrect address, waited several weeks for replacement. Got new tube, used a few times in winter 2017, now trying to use for first time today, and new tube had another hole in it near valve as well. Poor quality. Poor worksmanship. Not a good value. For price, I’d expect to last a few years without issue. You’re better off buying new $20-30 tubes every year or two, or the LL Bean tubes for similar price.
customer_reviews.author: devin torrey

customer_reviews.title: Great snow tube and made in the USA 😃
customer_reviews.text: Great snow tube! The tube really goes down perfectly even over holes and bumps. We have a blast using it :) and the insert really works great- you get going faster then you think you will- insert works best for adults when you are on your stomach. We are looking into getting a second!
customer_reviews.author: Colorado parents

customer_reviews.title: A tube worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Durable and kid tested. It does take about 20 minutes to fully inflate. It outlasted all the other cheaper tubes. The box was partially open upon delivery. I thought this tube came with an insertable hard disc for the bottom. My tube did not. It was past my 30 day window of return. I will buy more for my other kids next season.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy's Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Great for sledding!
customer_reviews.text: We love this tube! Pulls well behind the ATV, and it's great for using alone too. It was the favorite at the sledding hill we went to with family on New Year's Day. We fit 4 small kids on it and 2 adults...much more comfortable to ride on than those small, plastic sleds!
customer_reviews.author: SNKJ

customer_reviews.title: These tubes are great! I ordered two of them for my kids ...
customer_reviews.text: These tubes are great! I ordered two of them for my kids last winter. The other tubes we had kept getting holes in them and the plastic sleds ripped, but these Bradley tubes held up great! They are a good size for an adult or a child. We even rode in them with two riders (one adult and one child) although it was a little bit of a squeeze. The Bradley tubes made for a fun winter!
customer_reviews.author: shrea

customer_reviews.title: SEAM BROKE OUT DURING FIRST INFLATION, BEFORE IT EVEN HIT THE SNOW, NOT OVER-INFLATED...
customer_reviews.text: Kinda disappointing. I paid $100 bucks for this thing on the expectation it would be very high quality and last some time. I follow the set-up instructions to a tee, and for pete's sake, the seam line between the nylon top and vinyl bottom blew out before it even hit the snow. I did NOT over-inflate it, reading closely the directions and looking closely at the pictures that accompanied them. Be careful, maybe just a bad seam batch, but hopefully Bradley Sports will replace or refund. I will update here based on what they are able to to do help.
customer_reviews.author: Service Member

customer_reviews.title: Great quality tube
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with tube. It is very durable, I'm 6,2" 230lbs and it worked great for myself and my kids, which are 8 and 9 years old
customer_reviews.author: 3ptman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product -some of the fastest on the market
customer_reviews.text: Incrdible durability and safe. So much fun as these pick up speed and glide over the snow... wow!
customer_reviews.author: M.J.B

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, need air compressor
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know what to expect, but in this price range I hoped it was a good quality product. I know it’s a lot for a snow tube, but it was well worth the money. We had the only tube on the snow hill that didn’t pop and the ride down was super comfy. My 6 year old loved it! You do need an air compressor to fill it up though. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Strickland Cosemans

customer_reviews.title: Inflate till straps are tight
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2. These worked excellent for the whole family kids and adults. Inflate all the way until the covers are tight.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good construction.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for some snow fun. The grands loved it. We had 3, 5 year olds tucked inside and pulled it with a snowmobile. Can't wait for next winter.
customer_reviews.author: D. Maughan

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: The tubes came in a few days. We purchased several models. My 14 year old son and I inflated the tubes. A few valve stems were backed out, so we used the valve cap to tighten the valve. We have used sleds and tubes on our hill before, but we have never gone as fast or as far on the runs as we have with these new tubes. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin Fun

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Very Fun Snow Tube
customer_reviews.text: My son and his cousins have loved riding inside of this snow tube.
customer_reviews.author: BethTop Contributor: Minecraft

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Looks like it should last a while. Hopefully. Makes a great sledding tube.
customer_reviews.author: Jes Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: It takes a while to blow it up and make sure that its the right size, but otherwise I love this thing. It is make of very high quality material and is very fast. Its just as good as anything you'd find at a ski resort.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift but very heavy duty and nice!
customer_reviews.author: T.R

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TUBE
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Works great and is big enough for 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Seam of the cover ripped right out of the box. Probably not sewn to begin with. Poor quality control. Purchased as a Christmas gift but unable to use on rare chance with kids on break and me on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S. McCurdy

customer_reviews.title: Given to young adults as gifts. They love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very well made. Stands up to NY winter!
customer_reviews.author: Escanaba 2

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product but to big for our kids who are two and five years old
customer_reviews.author: Sam Nasr

customer_reviews.title: Great quality snow tube!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality! Very durable and can hold numerous kids at once!
customer_reviews.author: Michie

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love it and so does my 3 yr old. I see this lasting years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Hit on the hill. My sons Cub Scout group loved this when we went sledding.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Young

customer_reviews.title: great product on time and good value
customer_reviews.text: My 4yr old's christmas present was a big hit and us adults can ride on it with him no problem. thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Trochelman

customer_reviews.title: Great for snow and water
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this tube! We use it for both snow and water! Great quality and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed ... undersized inner tube
customer_reviews.text: The inner tube was too small for the outer material. We were disappointed to not be able to use this to play in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: trisha hughes

customer_reviews.title: Just add snow
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and looks great. The kids love it. It is not as fast as a solid bottom tube in soft sticky snow.
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have a strong air compressor
customer_reviews.text: This tube is solid! Very sturdy. Kids loved it and even held two adults
customer_reviews.author: David T Blaszak

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this tube for our sledding hill in Michigan. We didn't use the disc because our hill is long and lumpy.
customer_reviews.author: journey

customer_reviews.title: Fast down snowy hills!
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it.faster is better for kids going down snowy hills. It worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B. Luber

customer_reviews.title: ... day sledding with the scouts and it worked out great. There were lots of broken sleds an flattened ...
customer_reviews.text: We put it to the test all day sledding with the scouts and it worked out great. There were lots of broken sleds an flattened vynl tubes by the end of the day but our tubes didn't faulted st all. I'm very happy with this tube.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this tube. My little girl love it too. I just wish the make some kid size tube too.
customer_reviews.author: The Vue

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!!! We have two and have had a great time on the hill with them. People always asking where did you get those. Very well made, tough and durable :)
customer_reviews.author: Lise Noelle

customer_reviews.title: A small mix up on colors but was made right ...
customer_reviews.text: A small mix up on colors but was made right. These don't slide too well on soft snow. They are more suited for very hard snow.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: The Bradley tube is light enough that my five-year-old is comfortable dragging it
customer_reviews.text: There really is no comparison between this tube and the 'regular' blow-up tubes that everyone sells that seem to pop if they see any tiny piece of ice within a mile. The Bradley tube is light enough that my five-year-old is comfortable dragging it, but heavy duty enough that she can ride with Dad down the hill. Highly recommend this tube.
customer_reviews.author: rus_geek

customer_reviews.title: my order being correct
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a Christmas gift for kids and the Tube is way to small for the cover
customer_reviews.author: Greg Nester

customer_reviews.title: This tube is great. I'm 35 and I was tubing on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This tube is great. I'm 35 and I was tubing on the hill next to my house all winter last year. I told my wife it was for the exercise but really this thing is just that much fun. I wish it came with a butt protecting pad but it's nothing against this product. It's tough and fast.
customer_reviews.author: M. Acker

customer_reviews.title: Untested but seems really good quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't actually had another snow to use it yet...but my niece loves it as a lounge chair! Haha FAST shipping (to NC) and the construction quality seems very good! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: E Danielle White

customer_reviews.title: My daughter will enjoy for years to come
customer_reviews.text: Product is as at advertised. Really well made and worth the money. My daughter will enjoy for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett M. Fradette

customer_reviews.title: Arrived earlier
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for one, but for 2 people I would buy bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel

customer_reviews.title: However first time out the tow handle ripped pretty easily after only a short period of time
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived on time and is just as says. However first time out the tow handle ripped pretty easily after only a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality -- glad I picked this one even though it was a little more expensive. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia J Parker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality but kind of overpriced for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra E.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good strong tube. does toe but you will rip the hook if you use behing a sled. very fun
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like it a lot love it best thang I ever got
customer_reviews.author: Austin Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with the cover cracking and called right away. They sent a replacement out the next day. Great customer service and a great product. My 2 year old son had fun riding in it. It picks up speed fast. =)
customer_reviews.author: B. UY

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and holds up to tubing behind a four wheeler very well! Big kids and little ones alike had a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L.

customer_reviews.title: Towed great behind the ATV
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for us on the snow this winter. Only had a chance to use it one time; bottom is already ripped on the cover. Towed great behind the ATV; no trouble pulling apart or breaking at the tow strap, just the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: J Ponder

customer_reviews.title: The big size is great for
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, should last many seasons vs. the single-use types that are cheaper. The big size is great for adults
customer_reviews.author: Waffle Master

customer_reviews.title: An Inferior product.
customer_reviews.text: This is an Inferior product. The inner tube did provided with this model not inflate to fit the slip case and there was at least 4 inches of slack. When we finally tried using it, the tube had no ability to slide. It's almost like they used a material that was anti-slip on the underside. While rubber tire tubes are appealing because they seem stronger, this is now our second rubber tire tube and both have been a disappointment. I would stick to the plastic tubes, even though they may not last as long, they are more fun.
customer_reviews.author: AlanO

customer_reviews.title: extremely durable but doesn't slide as easily as some others on the snow
customer_reviews.text: extremely durable but doesn't slide as easily as some others on the snow. haven't tried it in the water yet.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: KOWABUNGA!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for xmas and we love it! we have taken it out twice now and this thing really picks up speed! And i like that you hover over the ground so I'm not so worried about rocks or bushes poking you and the way down. The outer cover seems to provide good protection and the inter-tube was easy to fill. Think we'll have this for years to come! Can't wait to take it out on a lake this summer.
customer_reviews.author: jillian

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: If the hill has the right kind of packed snow this is the tube to have....very strong too Looks like it can hold up to some abuse too
customer_reviews.author: William Kooney

customer_reviews.title: top quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas present - we got some early snow so my wife got an early present. I am very impressed with the quality of this product, nothing flimsy about it and once the run is packed this tube goes really fast! We are having so much fun. If you have ever gone to a Snow Tubing Park these are pretty much the same as what you see there.
customer_reviews.author: N. Larson

customer_reviews.title: snow tube Bradley
customer_reviews.text: high quality. much fun for kids in the snow. i would highly recommend. i have purchased multiple cheap version, that were not worth it
customer_reviews.author: mike monahan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Well worth it. Very fast in all types of snow.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The Cover Sent was way too big for the tube and is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: AshOhio

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly but is in an unmarked box without any instructions or paperwork. Giving as a Christmas gift but awkward to give without papers.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: it can be repaired like an auto or truck tube
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used this item yet, but it definitely looks tough. Hopefully it will handle the small brush well without puncturing. If it does puncture, it can be repaired like an auto or truck tube.
customer_reviews.author: Ray J.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE NOT HAD A CHANCE TO USE IT WE NEED SNOW ITS COMMING THANKS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only one you need!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome snow tube I’m sure it will last for many seasons. It can move my fat but with my kid with me with no problems!
customer_reviews.author: G. Stone II

product_meta.title: Bradley Commercial Snow Tube for Adults and Kids | 50" Heavy Duty Cover | Made in USA
feature_bullets: ★ DELUXE SNOW TUBE SET includes - Thick rubber inner tube. Commercial grade tube cover. Padded snow tube insert that doubles as a kids snow saucer. 6 foot long tow leash for hand pulling, and valve stem tool for quickly releasing air for storage (tool included inside valve cap).

SIZE: 40"-48" inflated diameter at full inflation. Tube becomes firm at 40". Continue to add air until tube has fully inflated (like a balloon). This size is ideal for people under 200 Lbs. Adults over 200 lbs. should choose a larger size.

★ COMFORTABLE & EASY TO USE - Bradley snow tube sleds are the smoothest ride on the slopes! These snow inner tubes provide an air cushion ride, compared with any winter sled on the planet. When fully inflated, the bottom of your snow slide surface will make a drum sound when you tap on it.

★ QUALITY ASSURANCE - Our customers agree, Bradley produces the best snow tubes on the market today. We make them here in the USA and we're proud of our workmanship. If you have questions about our product or you're not completely happy with what you receive, just give us a call or shoot us an email. We'll make it right. We promise!

★ PRODUCT SPECS: Designed and manufactured in USA - Includes heavy duty 1100D slick industrial vinyl bottom using RapidGlide anti-friction technology. 2 sewn-in handles; patent pending sewn-in tow loop and strap secures tube and cover*** Not intended for towing behind a motorized vehicle.
